name: Everyday
tagline: Get tasks done across apps with plain English
description: The easiest way to complete tasks across your favorite tools. Describe what you need, and Everyday handles it for you.

name: Sora 2
tagline: Turn your ideas into videos & drop yourself into the action
description: Turn text prompts and images into hyperreal videos with sound using the models from OpenAI. A single sentence can unfold into a cinematic scene, an anime short, or remix of a friend's video. If you can write it, you can see it, remix it, and share it.

name: Verdent Deck
tagline: Your AI code editor that runs multiple AI agents in parallel
description: Verdent Deck coordinates multiple AI agents to tackle complex coding tasks in parallel. Sessions can run on their own while you step away, collision-free execution, clear insight, and a seamless flow that turns ideas into real, shippable code.

name: Cursor 1.7
tagline: Agent autocomplete, hooks, and team rules
description: Cursor 1.7 is here! Introducing autocomplete for agent, hooks, team rules, ability to share prompts with deeplinks, and more. Look forward to hearing what you think!

name: Databuddy Analytics
tagline: Analytics, insights, and feature flags in one platform
description: Databuddy gives developers one place for analytics, logs, and feature flags. Itâ€™s type-safe, lightweight, and works across serverless, edge, and stateful environments. Privacy-first foundation, and a focus on user-experience and streamlined flows

name: Ask Brave
tagline: Your search engine is now a chat
description: Ask Brave is a new interface from Brave that unifies AI chat and web search. Get comprehensive, grounded answers and follow up with questions in a single, privacy-first conversation. Available on any browser.

name: Palify 2.0
tagline: Why post for free when you can post, earn & grow
description: Palify 2.0 is a space for creators to share work, grow together, and earn from their craft. Show what you do, build your voice, and connect with people who value it. Whether you design, code, or write, Palify helps you turn passion into progress and income.

name: Granola Recipes
tagline: Introducing recipes, in the all-new Granola Chat
description: Recipes are saved prompts written by experts that work with your meeting notes, combining the power of great AI prompts with the nuance of your work conversations.

name: US Global Mail
tagline: Turn every envelope into actionable intelligence
description: US Global Mail uses AI to read, summarize, and route mail, auto-deposit checks, and flag urgent documents, all securely (SOC2 & HIPAA) to save time and boost productivity.

name: Zellij
tagline: A terminal workspace with batteries included
description: A workspace aimed at developers, ops-oriented people and anyone who loves the terminal.

name: Vibe Coding Award
tagline: Showcasing the worldâ€™s most innovative vibe-coded projects
description: Vibe Code Award celebrates innovation in coding, honoring top projects and creators with recognition, visibility, and community impact.

name: Genspark Photo Genius
tagline: Voice-controlled AI photo editor!
description: OpenAI Realtime voice tech meets Nano-Banana image AI. Now you can edit photos just by talking. Tell it what you want, watch magic happen: â€¢ Perfect makeup, hair & outfit styling â€¢ Rescue your photo fails Just say it, Genspark nails it!

name: brs.studio
tagline: Generate AI Videos using the latest models in Telegram
description: An AI video generator that enables you to create and collaborate. Use the best models available (Veo3, Kling, Runway, Wan2.2) with no subscriptions and the ability to share credits with your team. Chat with the bot or add to group.

name: MCP by Alloy Automation
tagline: Connect your AI Agent to 400+ business systems in minutes
description: MCP by Alloy Automation is an AI developer toolkit and registry that exposes Quickbooks, Xero, Salesforce, Slack and hundreds more as safe tools for AI agents. Start building immediately at ai.runalloy.com.

name: Structura
tagline: Visualize and edit JSON like Lego blocks
description: Structura turns complex JSON into interactive graphs with real-time sync. Add nodes like bricks, link them together, and explore your data without losing alignment. Easier, more visual, more fun.

name: Pigeon
tagline: Chrome Extension for Opinion Insights
description: Pigeon analyzes any webpage to generate context-aware questions, surface related Reddit discussions, rank the most helpful comments, and provide AI-powered summaries, enabling fast discovery of real user opinions for research, shopping, and reviews.

name: NextTurn
tagline: GitHub meets social networking
description: Social networking for developers, powered by GitHub. Connect through real code collaboration, join communities around your favorite technologies, and build professional relationships that matter.

name: Terramind: Search
tagline: AI Search integrated with notes, calendar, projects, etc
description: AI search engine with deep research and multi-provider analysis

name: Illustria
tagline: AI-Powered Illustrations, Crafted for Your Projects.
description: Illustria is your go-to tool for generating high-quality, customizable illustrations in seconds. Whether youâ€™re designing a website, presentation, or app, our AI crafts unique SVG illustrations tailored to your needs - no design skills required

name: Hubters WebAI
tagline: Browser local AI made easy, save 95% on AI infrastructure
description: A platform that enables the running of AI models locally in the Browser(JavaScript Env) and allows developers to easily embed WebAI models into their Web Apps and save 95% on AI hosting cost. We're unlocking what's possible in the future of the AI. ðŸš€
